predictions.text: U.S. CPI (headline, YoY, NSA) for October 2025 will print between 3.1% and 3.6% in the BLS release due by 2025-11-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm the 12-month percent change for CPI-U (All Items, not seasonally adjusted) in the BLS CPI news release or data tables for October 2025 shows a value ≥3.1% and ≤3.6%.
monitoring_signals: Cleveland Fed CPI nowcast for October
AAA national gasoline price trends
Manheim Used Vehicle Value Index
Rent/OER tracker updates (Zillow, Apartment List)
Energy futures (WTI, natural gas) weekly changes
predictions.rationale: Energy, gasoline, and core shelter trends suggest modest YoY cooling but not a sharp drop; shutdown risk appears not to affect CPI timing.

predictions.text: China exports (YoY, USD terms) for October 2025 will print between -5% and +3% in the General Administration of Customs release by 2025-11-10.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check the official GACC monthly trade release for October 2025; confirm the YoY percent change in exports in USD terms is ≥-5% and ≤+3%.
monitoring_signals: NBS and Caixin manufacturing PMI new export orders
USD/CNY and CFETS RMB Index levels
Shanghai Containerized Freight Index / Drewry WCI
Port throughput data (Shenzhen, Shanghai, Ningbo)
U.S. tariff and export-control headlines
predictions.rationale: Tariff threats and weak external demand cap upside; policy support and base effects limit downside.

predictions.text: Euro area HICP (headline, YoY, flash) for November 2025 will print between 2.2% and 2.7% in Eurostat’s release due by 2025-11-29.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify Eurostat’s flash HICP headline YoY for November 2025 is ≥2.2% and ≤2.7% in the official news release.
monitoring_signals: National CPI prints (Germany, Spain, France, Italy)
Dutch TTF and Brent price moves
Euro exchange rate (DXY, EUR/USD)
Wage growth and negotiated pay indicators
PMI price indices
predictions.rationale: Energy base effects fade while services disinflation is gradual; headline stays near mid-2s barring a fresh energy shock.

predictions.text: From 2025-10-11 close to 2025-11-30 close, Invesco S&P 500 Equal Weight ETF (RSP) will outperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust (SPY) by at least 1.5 percentage points based on adjusted close percentage change.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compute percentage change in adjusted close for RSP and SPY from 2025-10-11 close to 2025-11-30 close (UTC). Success if (RSP% - SPY%) ≥ +1.5 pp using Yahoo Finance data.
monitoring_signals: RSP/SPY ratio trend
Market breadth (advancers/decliners, equal-weight indices)
Volatility regime (VIX) and rates moves
Positioning in megacaps vs cyclicals
Tariff headlines affecting large-cap tech
predictions.rationale: Tariff and regulatory pressure skew downside to megacaps, favoring breadth and equal-weight performance.

predictions.text: From 2025-10-11 close to 2025-11-30 close, iShares Semiconductor ETF (SOXX) will underperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust (SPY) by at least 3.0 percentage points based on adjusted close percentage change.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compute percentage change in adjusted close for SOXX and SPY from 2025-10-11 close to 2025-11-30 close (UTC). Success if (SOXX% - SPY%) ≤ -3.0 pp using Yahoo Finance data.
monitoring_signals: China regulatory headlines (SAMR) and U.S. export controls
Guidance and order trends from NVDA/AMD/QCOM/AVGO
Memory and foundry pricing (DRAM/NAND, TSMC capacity)
USD strength vs Asia FX (JPY, KRW, TWD, CNY)
U.S.–China policy signals impacting AI chips
predictions.rationale: Tariff risk, China antitrust pressure, and export controls disproportionately weigh on semis relative to the broader market.

predictions.text: The ETH/BTC exchange rate will reach 0.060 or higher on at least one UTC day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm ETH/BTC pair price on a major aggregator (e.g., CoinMarketCap) shows a print of ≥0.060 on any UTC day before the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Spot ETF flows and custody developments
Relative L2 activity and ETH staking rates
Macro risk appetite and USD liquidity
Stablecoin net issuance on Ethereum
Gas fees and builder/MEV revenues
predictions.rationale: Institutional access broadening and rotation from BTC toward ETH on relative value can push the cross higher episodically.

predictions.text: The U.S. 30-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS30) will close at or above 4.80% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify on FRED that DGS30 daily close is ≥4.80% on at least one date on or before 2025-11-30 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: Term premium estimates and issuance mix (Treasury refunding)
Inflation breakevens and real yields
Fiscal headlines and shutdown dynamics
Fed communications about balance sheet and policy path
Risk sentiment (equities, credit spreads)
predictions.rationale: Growth and fiscal concerns, plus term premium volatility, create upside tail risk for the long bond yield.

predictions.text: EIA-reported crude oil stocks at Cushing, OK will reach at or above 35.0 million barrels in at least one Weekly Petroleum Status Report published by 2025-11-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report (Table 3). Success if the reported Cushing, OK ending stocks are ≥35.0 million barrels in any weekly report before the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Midcontinent refinery utilization and maintenance outages
WTI-WTS and WTI-Midland diffs impacting flows
Pipeline nominations into/out of Cushing
WTI timespreads (front vs second month)
U.S. crude production and imports
predictions.rationale: Refinery maintenance and softer runs can drive crude builds at the Cushing hub into mid-November.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, the UK CMA will publish a formal consultation on proposed conduct requirements for Google Search under its Special Market Status designation.
predictions.verification_criteria: A consultation document or notice on GOV.UK from the CMA explicitly outlining proposed conduct requirements for Google Search under SMS is published on or before the deadline.
monitoring_signals: CMA policy updates and timelines under DMCC
Prior SMS consultations (scope, format, timing)
Industry stakeholder engagement announcements
Google’s public responses or preemptive policy changes
UK government digital markets guidance
predictions.rationale: SMS designation typically proceeds to consultation on conduct rules; political momentum favors prompt next steps.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, China will file a request for WTO consultations challenging new U.S. tariff or export-control measures announced in October 2025.
predictions.verification_criteria: WTO Dispute Settlement website lists a new request for consultations by China against the U.S. concerning October 2025 tariff/export-control measures, filed on or before the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Chinese Ministry of Commerce statements (MOFCOM)
USTR announcements and Federal Register notices
Diplomatic signaling and press briefings
Chinese state media coverage of retaliatory steps
Prior WTO case patterns and timelines
predictions.rationale: Escalatory U.S. measures increase the likelihood Beijing initiates a formal WTO process to preserve options and signal resolve.
